metadata.title: CVE-2023-4580 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Push notifications stored on disk in private browsing mode were not beingencrypted potentially allowing the leak of sensitive information. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 117, Firefox ESR < 115.2, and Thunderbird <115.2.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
